The Australian Death Check is a new data cleansing service that is the only official source.

The Australian Death Notification Service allows families to notify relevant organisations.

What it is all about

The only official source The Australian Death Check is a new data cleansing service.

The Australian Death Check allows businesses to cleanse customer data against over 3 million official government death records for the first time.

Bulk cleanses against over 3 million national death records in minutes

A joint initiative from the state and territory registries that offers a single source of truth.

Secure system that adheres to data protection law and regulations.

Gives immediate access to the most up-to-date death data in Australia.

The Australian Death Check allows businesses to cleanse customer data against over 3 million official government death records for the first time.

Data Service Brokers

The Australian Death Check is a ground -breaking new service designed to complement existing data

The Australian Death Check will help your clients to drive efficiencies,reduce costs and minimise risk. Using an API to seamlessly integrate into your own applications, the Australian Death Check accesses over 3 million national death records (updated daily) and returns results in minutes.

Stay ahead of the game

Become a Data Service Broker for the Australian Death Check, and benefit from

Access to the only official source of national death data in Australia.

Being positioned at the forefront of contemporary data integrity best practice.

Opportunities to increase your customer base to new organisations / markets.

An increase in revenue from your existing customer base.

Dedicated support / account management from the Registry.

A tiered pricing model, with no restrictions on your retail price.

How to access

Businesses and government agencies can request access to the Australian Death Check through an approved Data Service Broker.

Can you afford not to?

When a business uses inaccurate customer data,things can go wrong—quickly. In some cases, reputational damage can be irreparable—customer trust is broken, and financial loss inevitable.

The Australian Death Check will help you to maintain the accuracy of your data.

Take responsibility

By actively cleansing your customer information and identifying deceased persons, you will protect your brand, improve customer experience and save money.

You’ll also remove a burden from bereaved families, who will no longer need to notify your business about the death of a loved one.

Find out how to access

Request access to the Australian Death Check through an approved Data Service Broker.
